title: Brutus magazine nameplate
content:
Anyone know if it's a font or is it just custom drawn?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110223120226im_/http:/typophile.com/files/119687986_ac7efd99a1_6637.jpg)
author: Biff

comments.content: Thanks. Any idea what they might have based it on?

No, but here are some softies:

[Mustardo](http://web.archive.org/web/20110223120226/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FT.118682.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=BRUTUS&sampleSize=96)         [Frankfurter](http://web.archive.org/web/20110223120226/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=4&displayfontid=ITC.100337.0.0&fontRendererText=BRUTUS)         [Gusto](http://web.archive.org/web/20110223120226/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=3&displayfontid=DF.121622.0.0&fontRendererText=BRUTUS)  
lighter ----------------------\> heavier
